Description of C++ Demos
------------------------

Folder "ddrawviewer":
C++ Demo program using VRmUsbCam C API v2 and DirectDraw for Viewer,
with project files for Visual C++ 2008

Folder "ddrawviewer_cpp":
C++ Demo program using VRmUsbCam C++ API Wrapper and DirectDraw for Viewer,
with project files for Visual C++ 2008

Folder "dshow":
C++ Demo program using VRmUsbCamDS and VRmImageConverter,
with project files for Visual C++ 2008

Folder "multisensor_demo":
C++ Demo program using VRmUsbCam C API v2 and SDL for Viewer,
with project/makefile files for GCC or Visual C++ 2008

Folder "deviceinfo":
C++ Demo program using VRmUsbCam C API v2 which lists infos of connected devices,
with project/makefile files for GCC or Visual C++ 2008

Folder "restorefactorydefaults":
C++ Demo program using VRmUsbCam C API v2 which restores the factory config on connected devices,
with project/makefile files for GCC or Visual C++ 2008

Folder "sdlviewer":
C++ Demo program using VRmUsbCam C API v2 and SDL for Viewer,
with project/makefile files for GCC or Visual C++ 2008

Folder "sdlviewer_cpp":
C++ Demo program using VRmUsbCam C++ API Wrapper and SDL for Viewer,
with project/makefile files for GCC or Visual C++ 2008

Folder "vm_lib_demo":
C++ Demo program using VRmUsbCam C API v2, SDL, and VM_LIB for simple object regcognition,
with project/makefile  files for GCC or Visual C++ 2008
